New Records: Angel Di Maria scored his second consecutive goal in international matches, tying him with Gonzalo Higuain for the fifth-most goals in Argentina's history
Key Match Events: Angel Di Maria scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 40th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina head coach Lionel Scaloni decided to sit Lionel Messi for the first half to manage his fitness and condition
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni emphasized the importance of competing at their best as Argentina prepares for the Copa America
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina has not lost to Ecuador in their last seven meetings, dating back to 2019
